examples.name: Basic Units of Measure Grouping
examples.description: Groups all units of measure by their TypeID using GetAllUnitOfMeasure method
examples.usage: This calls AppState.GetAllUnitOfMeasure() and groups results by TypeID

examples.name: Units by Calibration Types with Parameters
examples.description: Groups units of measure filtered by specific calibration types
examples.usage: This calls AppState.GetUoMByTypes(int[] calibrationTypes) with [1,2,3] as parameter

examples.name: Units by Equipment Type
examples.description: Groups units of measure for a specific equipment type

examples.name: Alternative Grouping - By Name
examples.description: Groups units showing TypeID as key and UnitOfMeasureID as value, grouped by Name
examples.usage: Alternative grouping to show different property combinations

examples.name: Equipment Types Grouping
examples.description: Groups equipment types by calibration type (if method exists)
examples.usage: Groups equipment types by their calibration type

examples.name: Tolerance Types Grouping
examples.description: Groups tolerance types if available in AppState

implementation_notes.filter_property: The Filter property can contain JSON-serialized parameters for methods that require complex objects
implementation_notes.method_resolution: The Method property specifies the exact AppState method name to call
implementation_notes.parameter_handling: For methods with parameters, the Filter property can contain serialized parameter data

property_mapping.Key: Property name to use as dictionary key
property_mapping.Value: Property name to use as dictionary value
property_mapping.Group: Property name to use for grouping (outer dictionary key)
property_mapping.Filter: Optional parameters for the method (can be JSON string)

usage_in_code.with_parameters: // Parameters would need to be parsed from sf.Filter if present

real_world_scenarios.description: Use SelectFilter JSON to configure dropdown lists that are grouped by categories
Filter equipment by specific criteria and group by type
Group available standards by their classification
